ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Fighter armor and weapons at low level
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Nygaard, Jeff  To:  Sent: Tuesday, August 28, 2001 9:06 PM Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re:
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: "Nygaard, Jeff" <jeff.nygaard@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 28, 2001 9:06 PM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Fighter armor and weapons at low level


> At level 10, if you can not get one hit in for ONE point before the damage
> shield kills the mobs, you might want to stop trying to kill the dark reds
> and stick with black and yellow cons. Damage shields is one of the better
> tools for power leveling.

Of course. I was talking about LOW level characters, not level 10s. Yes, I
know, a level 10 is still considered a low level character, but I was
speaking of newly created characters up to maybe level 3 or 4 that often can
NOT get in one point of damage before the damage shield kills the mob.
